document.full_text: pro football hall of fame fullback joe perry, who was nicknamed "the jet" for his electrifying speed on the gridiron, died on monday at age 84.
document.title: hall of famer joe "the jet" perry dies at 84
lines_and_colors: pro football hall of fame fullback joe perry, who was nicknamed "the jet" for his electrifying speed on the gridiron, died on monday at age 84.
